name: Hawaiian Five-0 Burger

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breasts
ingredients.additionalInstruction: sliced in half lengthwise to create 4 thin cutlets

ingredients.name: Honey Mustard or Sweet & Spicy Mustard or Dijon-style mustard

preparation: Coat chicken breast halves with mustard on both sides and set aside.

Preheat grill to medium and cook chicken with lid closed for approximately 4–6 min per side or until cooked through and chicken has reached a Food Safe internal temperature of 165° F. Top each with a cheese slice during the last two minutes of cooking.
Spread one half of the buns with barbecue sauce, top with chicken breasts.
Top chicken breast with pineapple, onions, your favorite toppings, close buns and serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Honey Mustard
summary: A bold twist on a classic condiment made with 100% Canadian mustard seed and organic honey.

products.name: Sweet & Spicy Organic Mustard
summary: Golden, sweet, with just the right heat. You’ll love this on burgers and Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwiches—or as a dip for chicken fingers. It’s also amazing in potato salad and salad dressings.
